content: naalaam kaumaa
/thaaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa, dyvame! Ninakku sthuthi. Haaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa, dyvame! Ninakku sthuthi. Haaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa, uhaaleluyyaa dyvame! Ninakku sthuthi.
/tkarunayulla dyvame! Nin്re karunayaal njangalotu karuna cheyyaname.

/tnaam dyvaputhranmaaraayittheeruvaan / jeevicchirunnappol namme padtippicchavaraaya/ nammute pithaakkanmaare, / kurbaanakalilum praarththanakalilum naam orkkanam. / azhivillaattha lokamaaya svarggaraajyatthil / neethimaanmaarotum punyavaanmaarotumkoote / dyvaputhran avare aashvasippikkatte.
moriyo......
132-aam masumoor
/tsahodaranmaar otthorumicchu vasikkunnathu / ethra nanmayum ethra saundaryavumaakunnu.
/tathu aharon്re thalayinmelum / avan്re ankiyute nenchinmel veenukitakkunna thaatiyaaya avan്re thaatiyinmelum / olikkunna thylampoleyum / sehiyon malamel pozhiyunna hermon manjupoleyum aakunnu.
/tenthennaal avite kartthaavu enneykkum anugrahattheyum jeevaneyum kalppicchu.
/tdyvame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam......
eniyono
/tdyvamaathaavinu ormmayum / avalute praarththanayaal namukku sahaayangalum undaakatte.
/tneethimaanmaarkku ormmayum / avarute praarththanakalaal namukku sahaayangalum undaakatte.
/tdeerghadarshimaaruteyum, shleehanmaaruteyum, sahadenmaaruteyum praarththana / namukku kottayaayirikkatte.
/tkartthaave! Ninte sahadenmaarute thuramukhatthinum / ninte snehithanmaarute kootaarangalkkum njangale yogyaraakka .
/tdayayullavanum, karuna niranjirikkunnavanumaayullove! Ninte nyaayavisthaaradivasatthil / njangalotu karuna cheyyaname.
/tthanne vilikkunna paapikalilninnu / than്re karunaye virodhikkaatthavan vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu. Baarekmor.
/tshubaho… kartthaave! Vishvaasamulla sabhayute makkalkku nalla ormma undaakkaname.
/tmenaolam… ninte shreshdtatha udikkunna divasatthil avar ninte valatthubhaagatthu nilkkumaaraakaname.
mattoru eniyono
/tkanyakayaaya dyvamaathaave! Ellaakaalatthum / ellaanera tthum ninte praarththana njangalkku kottayaayirikkaname.
/t(kartthaave!) ellaanaazhikayilum / njangalkkaayi kenikal vaykkunna / dushtane, nin്re parishuddhanmaarute praarththanayaal / njangalil ninnu maayicchukalayaname.
/tnjangalute kartthaavaaya yeshumishihaa! Nin്re sleebaa njangalkku kottayaayirikkukayum / athinakatthu njangal maraykkappetukayum cheyyaname.
/tvachanamaaya yeshuthampuraane! Jeevanotirikkunnavare nin്re sleebaayaal kaatthukollukayum / maricchupoyavare nin്re karunayaal punyappetutthukayum cheyyaname.
/tnaam jeevanotirikkunna naal okkeyum / ellaayppozhum / pithaavineyum, puthraneyum, vishuddharoohaayeyum sthuthicchu vandicchu mahathvappetutthanam.
/tettavum karunayullavanaaya njangalute dyvame! Nee ezhunnellunna aa nin്re valiya divasatthil / nin്re valatthu bhaagatthu njangale nirutthaname.
/tee samayatthu ninakku sthuthipaatuvaan/njangale nee yogyaraakkiyirikkakondu / nin്re raajyam anubhavippaanum njangale yogyaraakkaname.
/tnjangalute maranatthinteyum jeevan്reyum naathanaaya kartthaave! Nin്re krupa njangalutemel undaayi / njangaluteyum njangalute maricchupoyavaruteyum / aathmaakkalinmel karuna cheyyaname.
/tkartthaave! Krupacheythu sahaayikkaname.
baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam…

/tthrithvatthinu sthuthi / thrithvatthinu sthuthi, sthuthikkappettathum / unayaayathum aadiyum anthavumillaatthathumaaya thrithvatthe njangal sthuthikkunnu / dyvame! Ellaaneratthum sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
kukkiliyonukal
(dyvamaathaavu)

ninnaal sthuthiyotu raajamakal-haa...Haa....
Ninvalamaayu raajabhaaminiyum.
/tninnazhakarachan mohippaan-haa...Haa....
/tnin janamorkkaaykku pithrugruhavum.
baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam...
ekbo

bhakthar pukazhchaa bhaajaname!
Ninniludicchorekasuthan
thrukkaral njangalilalivaan than
pakkalapekshayanakkenam.
sthaumenkaalos…
(kolo-moredmsho)

dyvatthin maathaa-mariyaaminnum nibiya-
nmaarkkum shleehanmaarkkum nal sahadenmaarkkum
sabhayin makkalkko-kkekkum kaalam thorum
ennekkum nallo-rormmayathundaakatte.
baarekmor. Shubaho…

thiruvullatthaal ka-nyakayaam mariyaaminnul
jaathanathaayu jaathi-kkaare vazhi neraakki,
rakshicchaval thannor-mmaykkounnathyam cherttha
suthanaayu sthothram, praarththikkattaval njangalkkaayu.
parishuddhanmaar

nayavaan panapole thalirtthitume. Haa...Haa...
Valarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol
/tvruddhathayilumavar thalirittu thazhacchitume, haa...Haa...
/tvarddhikkumavarkkuthushti pushtikalum
baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam…
ekbo

orupolingum maar (maartthomaa)
unda melum ninnormma
uthakaname nin praarththana nin-
ormmaye bahumaanicchorkkaayu.
sthaumenkaalosu....
kolo (moredramsho)

praarththanayin samayamithallo (maartthommaa)
pathivinpati ninkoottatthalayaayu praarththikka
impamezhum nin paattil shraddhiccheetum nin
aatukale moosheppol thrukky vaazhtthanam.
baarekmor. Shubaho ...

ninne varicchoru thaathannum (maartthommaa)
ninnormmaye bahumaaniccha suthanum sthothram
ninne muti chooteetunna roohaa vandyan;
nin praarththana krupayettatte njangalkkennum.
parethar

makkalilappan krupacheythupole-haa...Haa.....
Bhakthanmaaril dyvam krupa cheyyum.
/tpullinuthulyam naranute naalkalaho-haa…uhaa…
/tpookkunnithu vayalil pooccheti pole.
baarekmor. Shubaho… menaolam…
ekbo

sharanatthaale nin krupayil
maranamatanjoru daasare nin
jeevasvaramathunartthaname
kabarinnoodyaanatthinnaayu
sthaumenkaalos…
kolo (moredu sho)

rakshakane! Nin gaathratthe bhakshicchum nin
vilayerum rakthakkaasaa paanam cheythum
mrutharaayore naasham neekki jeevippi-
cchaniyenam ninne nokkunnavaril kaanthi.
baarekmor. Shubaho ...

mruthare jeevippippaanezhunnallum raajaa
mukilazhakin melaaghoshithanaayeetunnu.
Nayavaanmaar than mun kompin naadam ketti-
ttenkiyaninjethirelpaanaayu poyeetunnu.
moriyo…
maar apremin്re pothuvaaya bovuso

1. Kartthaave! Krupa cheyyaname
maathru vishuddha praarththanayaal

2. Mariyaaminnaayu shlommo va-
nnariyicchoraa maalaakha
dyvam yojippaayennaayu
vannarivingekeetenam.

3. Panineer haananiyaadyar mel
veezhtthiyoraa maalaakhaa thaan
mruthar thannasthikkoottatthil
krupayaam neer veezhttheetenam.

4. Kartthaave! Krupa cheyyaname
maathru vishuddhaabhyarththanayaal
punyam njangalkkum vaangi-
ppoyorkkum nalkeetenam.
